item.title: phpspec screencast
item.description: After @sD_Tobi recently poked me whether I knew phpspec, … and initially I had no idea except for having heard of it … I found this excellent screencast on laracasts.com to get a first impression. It’s just 17 minutes and he’s really enthusiastic about it :-)
